tool.name: Chop.seqs
tool.description: Trim sequences to a specified length

param.label: numbases - Number of bases to keep
keep - Part of the sequence to keep
short - keep sequences that are too short to chop

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documentation**
The chop.seqs_ command reads a fasta file of sequences and outputs a .chop.fasta file containing the trimmed sequences. It works on both aligned and unaligned sequences.
.. _chop.seqs: https://www.mothur.org/wiki/Chop.seqs
